title: Apsara Kanti Haaram: Emerald and Diamond Grand Necklace
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold. Features a generous array of brilliant-cut Diamonds (15.30 carats
4196 stones) and meticulously selected Round & Square Cut Rubies (21.12 carats
39 stones). Finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate filigree work embellished with diamond accents, complemented by strategically placed emeralds. Features a central floral motif pendant and drop-shaped green stones. Traditional South Indian aesthetics blend seamlessly with a modern open setting style, allowing maximum light to enhance the diamonds' brilliance. The cascading design creates a mesmerizing effect.
colors: and vibrant green (emeralds). The ruby adds a dash of red to the overall vibrancy. The classic combination of gold and green evokes a sense of auspiciousness and prosperity.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for Muhurtham ceremonies
and significant festivals. A statement piece for any modern Indian bride or for those seeking a touch of traditional elegance.
description: A true masterpiece of craftsmanship, this Kanti Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom. The use of high-quality diamonds and natural emeralds ensures lasting value. The intricate design reflects the rich cultural heritage of South India. The strategic color combination and impressive size makes this a standout piece that will capture attention and admiration.
